Description

Madison Karrh is a solo developer, focused on making short personal games full of heart. She is inspired by libraries, bugs, bones and decay.

History

Landlord of the Woods

Landlord of the Woods is a game about feeling behind all of your peers. Released March 2021. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1564090/Landlord_of_the_Woods/

Whimsy

Whimsy is a game about a walk through the forest. Released December 2019. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1170370/Whimsy/
